title: C-CLOWN(씨클라운) _ Far away...Young love(멀어질까봐) (Dance Ver.) MV

comments.text:
Man there's a guy for every taste. Lol. Based on their live performances, 
Siwoo is like the quiet and mysterious guy. Ray is like the cute and 
adorable guy. Kang Jun is like the playboy and charming type. T.K is like 
the swagalicious type. Maru is like the noona-type guy. I haven't really 
classified Rome yet. Haha. Comment your favorite type! My favorite is the 
charming playboy type (Kangjun)﻿

comments.text:
+Ino Uchiha Haha of course i know SHINee, and i absolutely love SHINee. 
I've been a kpop fan for almost 8 years now, i've been together with dbsk5, 
good old days. i know almost all kpop artists and groups and most of their 
songs, but this song by c-clown is just different. it has that something 
special for me, i love all their other songs too but this one is what made 
me fall in love with them. A very special song, their voices, the chorus, 
the lyrics, everything <3
